Texts.Eng:
If you'd like your own Space Station I can build you a ^orange;Station Transponder^reset; if you provide the materials to construct it. 
 I need ^green;1 ^orange;Power Core^reset;, ^green;12 ^orange;Copper Wire^reset;, and ^green;6 ^orange;Carbon Plate^white; to ^green;me or any other Transponder vendor^reset;. Note that you'll also be charged a ^green;20000^reset; pixel fee for labor.
